## Question 1

Define x and y
```{r}
x <- c(4, 2, 6)
y <- c(1, 0, -1)
```

* length(x)
```{r}
length(x)
```

* sum(x)

```{r}
sum(x)
```

* sum(x^2)

```{r}
sum(x ^ 2)
```

* x + y
```{r}
x + y
```

* x * y
```{r}
x * y
```

* x - 2
```{r}
x - 2
```

* x ^ 2
```{r}
x ^ 2
```

x * y[1:2]
```{r}
x * y[1:2]
```
